title: wide fire safety overhaul, sets one
desc: CM approves use of modern high-expansion foam generators to douse fires, orders smoke detectors and CCTV in buildings

title: Newborn dies after failures in maternity care at Ysbyty Gwynedd in Bangor
desc: Sonny Taylor was "left distressed for a significant amount of time" before his birth, a report says.

title: 5 charged in arson, extortion offences targeting Winnipeg convenience store owners, police say
desc: Five people have been charged and two others are wanted by police in connection with extortion-related offences at Winnipeg convenience stores, police say.

title: Cost of living adding to problem of illicit meat consumption - charity
desc: There's also a claim food safety rules disproportionately affect Pasifika and other migrant communities.

title: Scientists offer new insight into how common parasite T. gondii causes disease
desc: A University of California, Riverside team of scientists has found that Toxoplasma gondii, a common parasite affecting up to one-third of the global population, is far more complex than previously believed.

title: Wetter season expected across Horn of Africa, IGAD Warns
desc: Horn of Africa region likely to experience 45pc heavier than normal rainfall between March to May, 40pc near-normal rainfall in north-eastern and south-western Kenya, IGAD says.

title: Woman gave up hopes of modelling career after laser treatment burns, court hears
desc: At the time of the 2020 incident, Ana Coretchi was a part-time model preparing her portfolio in the hope of embarking on a full-time modelling career when she suffered first-degree burns, she claimed.

title: Russell ‘impressed’ by several teams on ‘exciting’ Day 1 of Barcelona Shakedown
desc: George Russell admitted that he had been left “pretty impressed” by several teams on the opening day of the Barcelona Shakedown, with the Mercedes driver hailing Monday as an “exciting day”.
